properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Watch issued January 6 at 2:36AM PST until January 8 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 10 to 14 feet at 12 seconds. For
the Hazardous Seas Watch, very steep and hazardous seas 9 to 11
feet at 7 to 8 seconds possible.

* WHERE...All areas will be affected, with the Small Craft
Advisory in effect before and after the Hazardous Seas Watch.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 AM PST Tuesday.
For the Hazardous Seas Watch, from late tonight through late
Tuesday night.

* IMPACTS...Steep to very steep and hazardous seas could capsize
or damage vessels. Bar crossing could become especially
hazardous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Consider altering your plans to avoid possible hazardous and very
steep sea conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT
